p:
whereby, Y is the predicted response, β
o is the interception coefficient, β
i is the linear coefficient, β
ii is the quadratic coefficient, β
ij is the interaction coefficient. The quality of the regression equations were judged based on the coefficient of determination R 2 and Lack of fit F-test, given the availability of center points replicates, and possibility of pure error calculation. Optimal levels of carbon and nitrogen were inferred from analysis of response surface plots.
